document_data.caption: A map showing Mount Kahdas in the Alimir Mountains.
document_data.name: Mount Kahdas
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Kahdas''' was the second tallest peak in the [[Alimir Mountains]].
document_data.Description:
Kahdas was one of the central Alimirs. Its elevation was 7,800 feet (2,400 meters) above sea level. 

Mount Kahdas was visible from 50 miles outside of [[Almraiven]]. It had sheared sides facing to the west that—together with the similar face of nearby [[Mount Phevos]]—were known as the [[Eye Tyrant Cliffs]].
document_data.History: The carvings on Mount Kahdas celebrated the victory of the [[beholder]]s against the [[human]]s of [[Calimshan]] during the [[Third Age of Calimshan|Third Age]].
